items.content_html: The Activity-Monitor is a lightweight tool designed to monitor and check the status of TCP connections and ports on a network. It provides real-time insights into the status of specific TCP connections, making it a valuable resource for network administrators and developers.

It provides real-time insights into the status of specific TCP connections, making it a valuable resource for network administrators and developers.
